FuncDef: This command is used to configure a source IP address entry that can be used to validate SNMPv1 and SNMPv2c requests.

ParaDef.Info: Configures the name of the src-host entry.
Configures an allowed source address for SNMP requests. This can be an IPv4 or IPv6 address. Values-ipv4-address: a.b.c.d.
